column4: got a question...just installed ubuntu and well, followed instructions on howto install the xvid, divx addons but it dosnt quite compute...can anybody help me please
what step you having problems with, specifically?
I mean
can you be more specific?  I promise I can help if you give me something to work with :-)  Perhaps an error message, or a description of what you are trying to do that isn't working
yes sure...give me a sec
went to this webpage http://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats
are you using apt-get, aptitude, or synaptic?
edit /etc/apt/sourcles.list with your favourite text editor
do I take out the two ##
do you have the line I posted above in there?
## Uncomment the following two lines to add software from the 'universe'
the two lines following that, yes
you'll have to do that as sudo/root, sorry I should have specified that
that is done
now do you have any lines in there with the word "marillat" ?
in your sources.list  -- okay, add a new line that consists entirely of  "deb http://debian.tu-bs.de/mplayer/ftp.nerim.net/debian-marillat/ unstable main"
done
now you should be able to install totem-xine and w32codecs from apt-get or synaptic, whichever you prefer
what should I write in the terminal to use apt-get to install the totem xine and etc?
sudo apt-get install totem-xine w32codecs
sorry, do an "sudo apt-get update" first
just run "sudo apt-get update" with no arguments, then do "sudo apt-get install totem-xine w32codecs"
done that and it seems to work...but one tiny error

W: Couldn't stat source package list http://debian.tu-bs.de unstable/main Packages (/var/lib/apt/lists/debian.tu-bs.de_mplayer_ftp.netrim.net_debian-marillat_dists_unstable_main_binary-i386_Packages) - stat (2 No such file or directory)
